cause.description:
raise awareness of the total lack of democracy that exists in the now one party totalitarian state of zimbabwe. Robert Mugabe is still the undisputed president even after 2decades. all attempts to organise free and fair elections have failed. Stop Zimbabwe from becoming another AFRICAN FAILED STATE> raise awareness.
1. free and fair elections
2. oust Bob the dictator
3. pressurise the south african government,Zimbabwe's closest neighbor,to end its pointless policy of "quiet diplomacy"
cause.name: Free Zimbabwe
